Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, hey <MYNAME>? What's the scoop?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, you came to see me? That's great!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
So, is something up?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know! You're hungry, right?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. You don't have to be so shy, you
know. Do you want something to eat?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
I'll fix something up for you in return
for picking up my notepad the other day.
Hold on a sec, it'll be ready soon.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's some omelet rice, my specialty!
Dig in while it's still nice and warm.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
How is it? Pretty delicious, right? I'm
a pretty good cook, you know.
You're unexpectedly quite feminine.
It's really quite delicious.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hold it right there! Was it really 
necessary to say "unexpectedly?"
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you don't really even think of
me as girl, do you? Keep saying things
like that and I won't cook for you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, just joking! Go on, eat up.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for coming to see me today. It's
been fun.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you're finished then? Well I'm glad
you liked it. Stop by again sometime.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Really expertly made, you say... I get
a bit embarrassed when I'm praised
like that, you know.
<PAGE>
I always used to help out around the
house, so I'm pretty used to cooking.
My omelet rice is always a big hit!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, you really are too kind, <MYNAME>.
Go on and eat up.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for coming to see me today! It's
been fun.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you're finished then? Well I'm
really glad you liked it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Huh? You think I'll make a good wife
someday?
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>, I'm not sure anything
is going to come of your sweet talk...
But thanks.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stop by again, OK? Next time I'll cook
something up that's even more delicious!
